summary: This FBI document records the receipt of a certified USPS letter from a complainant in Ohio who claims to be a victim of an international sex trafficking ring connected to Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. The complainant alleges being beaten and raped along with her son and nephew, identifies involved individuals as including politicians, a judge, and a physician, and reports death threats for speaking out. The document was forwarded to the NYO squad C-20 for awareness and potential action.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as a central figure in the international sex trafficking ring case referenced by the complainant.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned alongside Jeffrey Epstein in the case referenced by the complainant regarding an international sex trafficking ring.

events.title: FBI Receipt of Victim Letter
events.description: NYOC receives a certified USPS letter from a complainant in Ohio alleging to be a victim of an international sex trafficking ring connected to Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: A complainant from Ohio contacted the FBI, claiming to be a victim of an ongoing international sex trafficking ring linked to Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.
The complainant alleges being beaten and raped, and that her son and nephew were also victims.
The complainant reports that individuals involved have threatened to kill her if she reports the violations.
The complainant identifies involved individuals as including politicians, a judge, and a physician.
Due to safety concerns, the complainant requests contact only by mail.
